blog.source:
When the Internet was built, organizations worked together to lay the foundational infrastructure—from the protocols governing how data is sent and received and the way we discover domains, to the physical routers, servers, switches, and cables that connect the Web today. 

## Dijets TestNet v2.0.0

Dijets TestNet lays similar foundational infrastructure for the Dijets Inc. It introduces an independently operated, globally available blockchain network utilising Dijets ternary chain ledger system.  This enables the smart contract composability (i.e., the ability for smart contract applications through its Utility Chain). Participants and organisations can now use Dijets testnet to sample services depending on the needs of the use case and the trust requirements of the parties in a transaction, making cross application composability a reality. 

Early adopter organisations can now independently run decentralized applications and ECC networks for individual services and associated network utilities. The Testnet Launch allows testing of Dijets infrastructure, including its consensus protocol and optimisation of its network tools.

## Accessing the Test Network

Users can now choose the test netweork when using Dijets wallet and to sample Dijets ecosystem services.
blog.title: Dijets TestNet
blog.author: dijets_dev
